completion.item: <[!CDATA[contains the DOM reference of the widget]]>

<[!CDATA[Adds a CSS class to the itemParameters:
String className - new class
				]]>

<[!CDATA[Adds an eventlistener to the widgetParameters:
String eventType - the type of the eventObject listener - the listener
				]]>
<[!CDATA[Returns the CSS class namesReturns: the class name(s) ]]>
<[!CDATA[Returns application based data for this widget, or null if it has not been setReturns: application based data ]]>
<[!CDATA[Returns the parent for this widgetReturns: the widgets parent ]]>
<[!CDATA[Returns the style for this widgetReturns: the style ]]>

<[!CDATA[Tests if there is a specified classname existentParameters:
String the - class name to look forReturns: wether there is this class or not
				]]>

<[!CDATA[Removes a CSS class name from this item.Parameters:
String className - the class name that should be removed
				]]>

<[!CDATA[Removes a listener from this itemParameters:
String eventType - the type of the eventObject listener - the listener
				]]>

<[!CDATA[Sets application based data for this widgetParameters:
Object data - your data for this widget
				]]>
